General.Name: Sanurhasta Mitra PT
General.Description: PT Sanurhasta Mitra Tbk engages in the property development and hospitality business in Indonesia. It primarily develops housing projects and resorts, as well as manages cottages. The company's project locations are in Bali and Boyolali, Central Java. It also owns a villa, the Santai with various facilities. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
